Class Records

java.lang.Object
care.eka.records.Records
public class Records extends Object
Client for interacting with Eka Care Records API.

    • Records

  • Method Details

    • getAuthorization

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getAuthorization(List<Map<String,Object>> batchRequest) throws IOException
      Obtain authorization for uploading documents.
      Parameters:
      batchRequest - List of document requests
      Returns:
      Response containing presigned URLs for upload
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 List<Map<String, Object>> batchRequest = new ArrayList<>();
 Map<String, Object> request = new HashMap<>();
 request.put("dt", "lr");  // lab report
 request.put("dd_e", 1614556800);  // document date in epoch format
 request.put("tg", List.of("covid", "test"));  // tags
 
 List<Map<String, Object>> files = new ArrayList<>();
 Map<String, Object> file = new HashMap<>();
 file.put("contentType", "application/pdf");
 file.put("file_size", 1024000);  // size in bytes
 files.add(file);
 
 request.put("files", files);
 batchRequest.add(request);
 
 JsonNode authResponse = client.getRecords().getAuthorization(batchRequest);

    • uploadDocument

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode uploadDocument(String filePath, String documentType, Long documentDate, List<String> tags, String title) throws IOException
      Upload a document to Eka Care.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the file to upload
      documentType - Type of document (e.g., 'lr' for lab report, 'ps' for prescription)
      documentDate - Document date as epoch timestamp
      tags - List of tags for the document
      title - Title for the document
      Returns:
      Response containing document ID
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode response = client.getRecords().uploadDocument(
     "/path/to/lab_report.pdf",
     "lr",
     List.of("covid", "test"),
     "COVID-19 Test Report"
 );
 String documentId = response.get("document_id").asText();

    • listDocuments

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode listDocuments(Long updatedAfter, String nextToken) throws IOException
      List documents.
      Parameters:
      updatedAfter - Filter documents updated after this timestamp
      nextToken - Token for pagination
      Returns:
      Response containing list of documents
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode documents = client.getRecords().listDocuments(null, null);
 for (JsonNode doc : documents.get("items")) {
     System.out.println(doc.get("record").get("item").get("document_id").asText());
 }

    • getDocument

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getDocument(String documentId) throws IOException
      Get details of a specific document.
      Parameters:
      documentId - ID of the document
      Returns:
      Document details
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode document = client.getRecords().getDocument("document123");
 System.out.println(document.get("document_type").asText());

    • updateDocument

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode updateDocument(String documentId, String documentType, Long documentDate, List<String> tags, Boolean ndhm, String oid) throws IOException
      Update a document's metadata.
      Parameters:
      documentId - ID of the document
      documentType - Type of document (e.g., 'lr' for lab report)
      documentDate - Document date as epoch timestamp
      tags - List of tags for the document
      ndhm - Whether to link the document to NDHM
      oid - OID to associate with the document
      Returns:
      Empty response on success
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 client.getRecords().updateDocument(
     "document123",
     "ps",
     null,
     List.of("medication"),
     null,
     null
 );

    • deleteDocument

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode deleteDocument(String documentId) throws IOException
      Delete a document.
      Parameters:
      documentId - ID of the document
      Returns:
      Empty response on success
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 client.getRecords().deleteDocument("document123");

    • retrieveHealthRecords

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode retrieveHealthRecords(String identifier, String hipId, String healthId) throws IOException
      Retrieve health records in FHIR format.
      Parameters:
      identifier - Care context ID
      hipId - Health Information Provider ID
      healthId - ABHA address
      Returns:
      FHIR bundle containing health records
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode records = client.getRecords().retrieveHealthRecords(
     "care_context_123",
     "hip123",
     "user@abdm"
 );
